title: Calculate Greatest Common Divisor (GCD)
description:
GCD function calculates the greatest common divisor (GCD) of A and
B.
name: GCD

input.name: A
input.description: The first integer for which the GCD is to be calculated.

input.name: B
input.description: The second integer for which the GCD is to be calculated.

output.name: GCD
output.description: The greatest common divisor of A and B.

return_value.description: The calculated GCD value that is returned by the function.
